quote: Don’t expect to be motivated every day to get out there and make things happen. You won’t be. Don’t count on motivation. Count on Discipline.
author: Jocko Willink

quote: The purpose of life is finding the largest burden that you can bear and bearing it.
author: Jordan B Peterson

quote: When you think you’re done, you’re only at 40 percent of your body’s capability.
author: David Goggins

quote: Most men lead lives of quiet desperation.
author: Joe Rogan
